scripts.pact:publish: pact-broker publish ./pacts --consumer-app-version=$npm_package_version --auto-detect-version-properties --broker-base-url=http://127.0.0.1:8000 --broker-username darvin --broker-password darvin && curl -X PUT -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -u darvin:darvin http://127.0.0.1:8000/pacticipants/UserConsumer/versions/$npm_package_version/tags/main
